content: #CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CATENA_Network#CMCX_CoinHello Guys, CORE (Cryptographic Object Resource Engine)— is Multi Chain PoS Network focused on Interoperability, Scalability and Usability. It utilizes AI Enabled Proof of Stake Algorithm, Multi Layered Consensus Model and Voting Based Governance.It would attain higher level of Scalability using Advanced Sharding along with Pipelining and Chunking and Parallel Transaction Processing. These technologies have made it possible for the CORE network to be infinitely scalable and to achieve significantly higher throughput and efficiency. Follow the links below to get more info:Website: https://www.coremultichain.comDejaVu Test-net: https://dejavu-testnet.coremultichain.comCORE Paper: https://coremultichain.com/docs/core-paper.pdfTwitter: https://twitter.com/COREMultichainTelegram channel: https://t.me/coremultichainTelegram group: https://t.me/coremultichaingroupCoinMarketCap: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/core-multichainYouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/coremultichainGitHub: https://github.com/COREMultichainWallet: https://wallet.coremultichain.comStaking: https://dapp.coremultichain.comCertik: https://www.certik.com/projects/coremultichainInstagram: http://instagram.com/coremultichainMedium: https://coremultichain.medium.comGrowth: https://growth.coremultichain.comRoadmap: https://coremultichain.com/roadmapTechnology: https://coremultichain.com/technologyCORE Ecosystem: https://coremultichain.com/ecosystem#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CORE #CMCX #COREMultiChain

comments.body: #CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CATENA_Network#CMCX_CoinThe name of the project consists of two parts: CORE + MultiChainThe main goal of the project can be understood from the name of the project1- CORE = Cryptographic Object Resource Engine2- MultiChain = A Virtual World of Interconnected Blockchains#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin
